principle.title: AI Comic Generation Process
principle.content: Our system uses advanced AI technology to transform your text into professional comic scripts and images through a two-stage process:

stage1.subtitle: AI analyzes your input
stage1.detail1: Natural language processing of your story

models.title: Available AI Models
models.content: We offer multiple AI models optimized for different use cases:

specialized.title: Specialized Models
specialized.content: Models optimized for specific styles and tasks:
specialized.detail4: Each model is tuned for its target domain

qwq32b.title: QwQ-32B Model
qwq32b.content: Our most advanced model with exceptional creative capabilities:
qwq32b.detail1: Rich story details and logical coherence
qwq32b.detail4: Higher resource usage but top quality

kimi.title: Kimi Model
kimi.description: Balanced performance for general comic creation

deepseek7b.title: DeepSeek-7B Model
deepseek7b.content: Balanced performance model with fast generation:
deepseek7b.detail2: Good quality for most use cases

parameters.title: Generation Parameters
parameters.content: Fine-tune your generation with advanced parameters:

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.content: Controls how closely AI follows your prompts:
guidance_scale.subtitle: Guidance Scale Settings
guidance_scale.detail2: Medium values (7-12): Balanced creativity and adherence
guidance_scale.detail4: Choose appropriate guidance based on your needs

num_inference_steps.title: Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.subtitle: Inference Steps Settings
num_inference_steps.detail1: Low steps (10-20): Fast generation, moderate quality
num_inference_steps.detail2: Medium steps (20-30): Balanced speed and quality
num_inference_steps.detail3: High steps (30-50): Highest quality, longer time
num_inference_steps.detail4: Higher steps yield more refined generation

seed.title: Random Seed
seed.subtitle: Random Seed Settings
seed.detail1: Random seed (-1): Different results each time
seed.detail3: Use same seed for consistent outputs

optimization.title: Getting Best Results
optimization.content: Follow these tips for optimal comic generation:
optimization.tip1: Provide detailed and specific story descriptions
optimization.tip2: Use clear character names and consistent traits
optimization.tip3: Specify scene atmosphere and emotional tone

hand.title: Hand Rendering Optimization
hand.content: Improve hand quality in AI-generated images:
hand.detail1: Explicitly mention hand position and pose in prompts
hand.detail2: Use phrases like 'clear hands' or 'correct fingers'
hand.detail3: Avoid complex hand actions; start with simple poses
hand.detail4: Use negative prompts to avoid common hand mistakes

text.title: Text Clarity
text.content: Ensure clear and readable text in comics:
text.detail2: Choose easy-to-read fonts suitable for comics
text.detail3: Ensure dialogue bubbles are clear and well-placed

character.title: Character Consistency
character.detail1: Use clear, descriptive names for each character
character.detail2: Maintain consistency in character traits and personalities
character.detail3: Provide detailed visual descriptions for characters
character.detail4: Use character sheets to ensure cross-scene consistency

story.title: Story Optimization
story.detail1: Plan story arcs and character development clearly
story.detail2: Use scene transitions to create smooth narrative flow
story.detail4: Incorporate emotional beats and pacing variations

visual.title: Visual Appeal
visual.detail1: Use diverse camera angles and compositions
visual.detail2: Pay attention to lighting and atmosphere
visual.detail3: Choose art styles that match the story tone
visual.detail4: Maintain consistent character and background design

technical.title: Technical Tuning
technical.detail2: Try different models to find the best fit

cost.title: Service Pricing
cost.content: We offer flexible pricing options to meet different needs:
cost.free: Free tier with daily generation limits
cost.activation: Use activation codes for additional generations
cost.premium: Premium plans coming soon with unlimited access
cost.value: All generated content is yours to keep and use

copyright.title: Copyright and Usage Rights
copyright.content: You have full rights to use generated content:
copyright.ownership: Users retain full ownership of generated comics
copyright.commercial: Free to use for both personal and commercial purposes
copyright.restriction: Cannot claim AI model as your own creation
copyright.modification: Feel free to edit and modify

usage.title: Using Generated Comics
usage.content: Generated comics can be used in various ways:
usage.modification: Feel free to edit and enhance further

troubleshooting.title: Generation Issues and Solutions
troubleshooting.timeout: If generation times out, try shorter text or faster models
troubleshooting.quality: For poor quality, try more detailed prompts or different models
troubleshooting.consistency: Use consistent character descriptions across scenes
troubleshooting.retry: Don't hesitate to retry with adjusted parameters

composition.title: Page Composition Essentials
composition.content: Define a clear narrative hierarchy with consistent reading flow and visual weight distribution.
composition.item1: Establish focal points and reading order
composition.item2: Balance panels: vary sizes for rhythm

scene.title: Scene Design Principles
scene.content: Every scene must serve a purpose: introduce, develop, twist, or resolve.

transition.title: Transition Techniques
transition.content: Use visual and narrative cues to connect panels smoothly.
transition.item2: Use symbolic elements for thematic bridges

technical.title: Technical Constraints
technical.content: Understand current model and platform limits to set realistic expectations.
technical.item2: Character consistency across panels may vary
technical.item3: Complex hand/pose rendering can be challenging
technical.item4: Generation latency depends on model and load

performance.title: Performance Considerations
performance.content: Optimize for speed/quality trade-offs based on context.
performance.item2: Reduce steps for drafts, increase for finals
performance.item3: Cache prompts and reuse seeds for stability
performance.item4: Avoid overly long inputs in a single request

practices.title: Recommended Practices
practices.content: Adopt best practices to improve robustness and consistency.
practices.item2: Keep character sheets and scene notes
practices.item3: Iterate on one variable at a time

basics.title: Integration Basics
basics.content: Two-stage pipeline: script generation then image generation.
basics.item1: Use text model for structured scripts

endpoints.title: Key Endpoints
endpoints.content: Recommended route separation for clarity and scaling.

practices.title: Integration Best Practices
practices.item2: Time out long requests and show progress
practices.item4: Respect API rate limits and backoff
